title: O MAKE ME LORD INTO YOUR PATTERN
bible_ref: And he saith unto them, Follow me, and I will make you fishers of men. Matthew 4:19
verses: I want to know you, know you Jesus,=I want to know you, know you.
I want to own you, own you Jesus,=I want to own you, own you.
I want to love you, love you Jesus,=I want to love you, love you
I want to serve you, serve you Jesus,=I want to serve you, serve you
I want to praise you, praise you Jesus,=I want to praise you, praise you
chorus: O make me Lord into your pattern=O make me Lord into your will=O make me Lord into your pattern=O make me Lord into your will
